categories: Category:Creatures of the Outer Rim Territories

nodes.text: The indola, also known as the Sabretoothed Tree Sloth were tree-dwelling predators native to the planet Dar'Or. Their favorite prey was young Ri'Dar. A single indola could wipe out the young of an entire Ri'Dar warren, though the adults could usually escape by flying away. Indola had tough skins and a high pain tolerance, easily able to resist to the primitive arrows and spears of the Ri'Dar.
Some smugglers attracted to Dar'Or to poach elix also took indola away with them to sell to animal trainers.
